Interface Car

All Known Subinterfaces:
LoadableCar
All Known Implementing Classes:
Saab95, Scania, Volvo240
public interface Car
An interface that marks the implementor as a car.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    brake(double amount)
    Slows down the vehicle.
    void
    gas(double amount)
    Speeds up the vehicle.
    Direction
    getDirection()
    Returns the current position of the vehicle.
    String
    getModelName()
    Returns the model name of your specific vehicle.
    void
    move()
    Moves the vehicle.
    void
    setPosition(Point2D position)
    Sets the position of the vehicle.
    void
    startEngine()
    Starts the engine and sets the current speed.
    void
    stopEngine()
    Method that will set the current speed to 0.
    void
    turnLeft()
    Turns the vehicle one cardinal direction going counterclockwise.
    void
    turnRight()
    Turns the vehicle one cardinal direction going clockwise.

  • Method Details

    • startEngine

      void startEngine()
      Starts the engine and sets the current speed.

    • stopEngine

      Method that will set the current speed to 0.

      Returns the model name of your specific vehicle.

      Returns the model name of your specific vehicle.

    • getDirection

      Direction getDirection()
      Returns the current position of the vehicle.

      Returns the current position of the vehicle.

    • setPosition

      void setPosition(Point2D position)
      Sets the position of the vehicle.
      Parameters:
      position - The position to set the vehicle to.

    • move

      void move()
      Moves the vehicle.

    • turnLeft

      void turnLeft()
      Turns the vehicle one cardinal direction going counterclockwise.

    • turnRight

      void turnRight()
      Turns the vehicle one cardinal direction going clockwise.

    • gas

      void gas(double amount)
      Speeds up the vehicle.
      Parameters:
      amount - Factor increasing the speed, must be in the interval [0,1].
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when amount is outside the interval [0,1].

    • brake

      void brake(double amount)
      Slows down the vehicle.
      Parameters:
      amount - Factor decreasing the speed, must be in the interval [0,1].
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when amount is outside the interval [0,1].
